Commissions

Commissions are currently open!

LioranBoard can be very time consuming to learn. If you have an idea you would like to implement in your stream without going through all the hassle, I can help with that!

What I offer:

  • Custom created buttons
    If LioranBoard supports it, I can make it happen for you!
    Optionally, I can also (roughly) explain the process of coding it and how it all works together.
  • Integrations with other applications and platforms

    Is there anything you would like to control directly from LioranBoard?
    Maybe you would like your viewers to be able to interact with your music app.
    Or retrieve, process and update data in Google Sheets.
    Or get notified of any new pledges on your Patreon.
    Or have new Discord posts displayed in your Twitch chat.
    Or be able to translate your incoming or outgoing chat messages in real time.
    Or how about triggering buttons with your voice?
    This and much more can all be done via custom made extensions.

If you are interested in a commission, please contact me at or message Christinna#9031 on Discord.

Note: I don't offer teaching lessons or troubleshooting your LioranBoard. You're free to join our Discord channel which has a lot of helpful resources and experienced folks willing to help with setting up your board.
